articles.title: U.S. munitions companies keen on sale of military hardware to S. Korea
Posters of international figure skating festival  for "Paektusan cup" produced
articles.content:
U.S. munitions companies keen on sale of military hardware to S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Businessmen of the U.S. Boeing Company and other munitions companies were locked in bargaining in South Korea over sale of new type fighters to it, Seoul-based Yonhap News reported.
 A senator from the state of Missouri where the F-15 fighter bombers plant of the Boeing Company is located, when meeting with Jo Song Thae, "   Minister of National Defence"  of South Korea, on Jan. 13, reportedly expressed his intention to sell fighters to South Korea. on the 29th of January Daniels, manager in charge of war planes and missile parts of the Boeing Company met with chiefs of staff of all services of the South Korean army and briefed them on the planes, requesting them to purchase those planes.    
 At the beginning of the year the Boeing Company side put on a South Korean newspaper an ad introducing F-15K fighter bombers of its own making and sponsored a function at hayat hotel in Seoul on Jan. 31 for the same purpose.

articles.title: Sports contest for " Paektusan Cup"  held
articles.content:
Posters of international figure skating festival  for "Paektusan cup" produced 
    Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Posters have been produced on the threshold of the 10th international figure skating festival for " Paektusan Cup"  to be held on the occasion of the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 The posters vividly reflect the ardent desire and aspiration of all people to significantly celebrate the day as a most auspicious holiday common to humankind.    
 They include a poster on the theme that as there is the February holiday, the future of the 21st century is rosy and a poster giving warm welcome to the foreign friends coming to the festival with best wishes for longevity of Kim Jong Il.

Diplomatic relations between DPRK and Spain established
Rodong Sinmun supports Chinese government's anti-Falun Gong stand
Lift of sanctions against Libya called for
Message of greetings to PM of Grenada
South side's delegation here for cooperation sub-committee meeting
articles.content:
Message of greetings to PM of Grenada 
    Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK cabinet Hong Song Nam sent a message of greetings to prime minister of Grenada Keith Mitchell on the occasion of its 27th independence day.
 It extended congratulations to the government and people of Grenada on its independence day and wished him success in his work for progress and prosperity of the country.
